item.description:
OK, the one thing that bugs me about meetup is that it books future events automatically, copying the next to last event's info... So, the original May posting was incorrect! I think I fixed it for the future...

Usually I plan the meetup for the second Sunday of the month, but I am going to be out of town that day(again-grrr). Because everyone who provided feedback had such a good time at the April meetup, I am booking May's event for the THIRD Sunday of the month. This way I can get in on the fun too!

I chose Cricket's Restaurant in Smithfield for this month's event. I know it is a little further North than the last few events, but "variety is the spice of life", right? It has a pre-fixe all you can eat buffet for $14.95 which includes a Bloody Mary or Mimosa for those who are inclined.

If this event fills up, please RSVP "No" with a comment requesting to be wait listed.

In order to help defray the cost of hosting a group on meetup, I would like to ask all members who attend meetups to contribute a dollar at alternating events. There will be no real tracking of this, but it would just be a good will donation to help me out. Thanks all!

I look forward to meeting everyone. Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the one in the picture with the red hair :-)
item.why: You will get good food and great conversation with people who have similar interests(well at least in brunch anyway)...
item.name: Rhode Island Brunch Bunch! May Meeting- Cricket's Restaurant
